title: How to Get HM Fly on Pokémon HeartGold or SoulSilver

steps.title: Go to Ecruteak City.
steps.content: Go to Ecruteak City. Visit the Ecruteak City Gym and defeat Morty to get the Fog Badge. This allows you to use HM Surf outside of battle. [1] X Research source

steps.title: After defeating Morty, go southeast in the city to find the Dance Theater.
steps.content: After defeating Morty, go southeast in the city to find the Dance Theater. Enter it.

steps.title: Find the Team Rocket Grunt bullying a Kimono Girl on the stage.
steps.content: Find the Team Rocket Grunt bullying a Kimono Girl on the stage. Walk up to the Grunt and talk to him. Defeat him in battle.

steps.title: Walk down off the stage and talk to the gentleman who approaches you.
steps.content: Walk down off the stage and talk to the gentleman who approaches you. He gives you HM Surf because of your bravery. Now teach Surf to one of your Pokémon.

steps.title: Go to Olivine City.
steps.content: Go to Olivine City. Go down from the entrance to the beach. Surf into the water. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Keep surfing downwards.
steps.content: Keep surfing downwards. Gradually turn to the left at the bottom of the screen when you reach the rocks. Avoid the whirlpool and continue west. You'll wash up on Cianwood City. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the Cianwood City Gym and defeat Chuck.
steps.content: Enter the Cianwood City Gym and defeat Chuck. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Once you beat Chuck and get the Storm Badge, walk outside the gym.
steps.content: Once you beat Chuck and get the Storm Badge, walk outside the gym. Talk to the lady near the entrance and receive HM Fly. [5] X Research source
